scenario_text.value:
I dunno... Doubting her because she had some
of Miu’s stuff seems kinda...no, real flimsy.

Kaito, are you sure you aren’t jumping to
conclusions? What about what she has to say?

Takuma, you must be able to see that
something’s not quite right here.

Uh, well... I don’t think we know enough yet
to say for sure.

Wait, hold on a minute. Didn’t the professor
say only children get offered as sacrifices?

And if so, doesn’t that make it strange for
there to be an adult here?

I’m not so sure. I mean, the sacrifices might
not have anything to do with this.

Besides, the professor was brought here as an
adult. Maybe it’s not that strange?

Who cares about some random disappearances?!
She did something to Miu!

Ugh! This is getting so old. Would you give
it a rest?

Damn it, why won’t you believe me? You can’t
tell me she’s not suspicious!
